# labelFont

**Instance Property**

Returns the font used to label the thumbnails.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var labelFont: NSFont? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The font used in the thumbnail labels.

## Discussion

Typically, the label of a thumbnail is the page number of the page it represents.

## Working with Thumbnail View Display Characteristics

- **maximumNumberOfColumns**: Returns the maximum number of columns of thumbnails the thumbnail view can display.
- **backgroundColor**: Returns the color used in the background of the thumbnail view.
